segments.text: We have successfully fulfilled our work plan . In fact , we are No . 1 in terms of market share .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have gotten amazing success . Congratulations !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope we can continue to get support from the departments concerned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Without a doubt . Relevant department will try their best .
segments.speaker: S2
